long_description: A lightweight soft shell, the women's Mammut Ultimate Light Jacket blocks chilling winds yet is highly breathable thanks to GORE(R) WINDSTOPPER(R) Active shell fabric. 3-layer GORE WINDSTOPPER Active is extremely lightweight, windproof and very breathable, making it ideal for fast-paced mountain sports. Pit zips vent quickly. Lycra(R) thumbholes in the cuffs extend hand coverage. Welded zippered arm pocket; zippered hand pockets. Mammut Ultimate Light Jacket for women is a great choice for trail running, rock climbing, backpacking and hiking.
short_description: A lightweight soft shell, the women's Mammut Ultimate Light Jacket blocks chilling winds yet is highly breathable thanks to GORE(R) WINDSTOPPER(R) Active shell fabric.
